description: Autonomous aerial unit designed for surveillance, monitoring, and rapid response in urban environments.

skills.explanation: Autonomous overhead sweep of a defined area to detect points of interest or anomalies with area coverage reporting.
Runs onboard/edge vision models to identify specified objects (e.g., bag, scooter, person) in the live feed or recent captures.
skills.possible_outputs: detections(list: class, bbox, confidence); track_ids; snapshots

skills.explanation: Provides a low-latency live video stream from the drone camera to authorized viewers and/or records the session.
Broadcasts a synthesized or pre-recorded audio message to people in a defined zone while logging coverage/response metrics.

description: Autonomous ground vehicle designed for package delivery in urban environments.

skills.explanation: Verifies order at merchant, authenticates with a code, and loads the item into a secured compartment.
Plans and executes a curbside-safe route between two points, respecting pedestrian rules and dynamic obstacles.
Uses authorized credentials to pass entrances, operate doors/elevators, and reach the designated indoor delivery point.
Performs authenticated transfer of the parcel to the intended recipient and records proof of delivery.

description: Autonomous ground vehicle designed for light maintenance, inspection, and environmental sensing tasks in urban settings.

skills.explanation: Collects ground-level measurements for safety and maintenance diagnostics (e.g., smoke, temperature, AQI, noise).
Executes simple corrective actions on public assets or paths within safety limits and tool capability.
Picks up small waste items/bags from specified locations and transports them to designated collection points.
Places or updates a scannable tag on-site and registers it in the city maintenance/incident system.

description: Lightweight aerial unit designed for rapid response, light item transport, and location marking in urban environments.

skills.explanation: Quick-launches to a nearby point to provide immediate presence, observation, or lightweight support.
Collects very small/light objects using a simple end-effector under appropriate safety limits.
Performs precise balcony drop-off using stable hover and gentle release with visual confirmation.
Marks an exact spot with a visual/audible signal and shares its coordinates/link with authorized users.

description: Autonomous ground vehicle designed to facilitate remote presence, communication, and guided navigation in urban environments.

skills.explanation: Initiates a real-time telepresence session allowing the requester to see/speak with people on site.
Authenticates and operates building elevators to move between floors as part of a guided escort or delivery.
Plans and executes wayfinding inside buildings while adapting to obstacles, signage, and accessibility constraints.
Notifies on-site personnel with context (who/where/why) and tracks acknowledgments and follow-ups.
